works.complaint:
Dear Google,

Our site Esources.co.uk has been under constant attack by a fraudulent  
company called Dropshipland.com that we exposed back in 2010 for creating  
duplicate websites (ukdropshipgroup.com, dpbuk.co.uk and dvddropship.com)..  
The owner has since been creating fake blogs, forum threads, and reviews  
across sites in order to defame us.
  We have calculated that over 90% of the posts were submitted by the owner  
of the forum, based on the fact that the name surname combinations very  
rarely match any of our over 880,000 accounts:
